title: Video of Draymond Green Punching Jordan Poole at Practice Goes Viral
description: Green, known as a fierce player, turned on teammate Jordan Poole during a practice and ended up in a viral video.
dc:creator: Scott Cacciola
media:description: Draymond Green, left, and Jordan Poole during a game against the Boston Celtics in June. On Wednesday, Green punched Poole in the face at a practice.
